column5: Studio Condo located next to Schlitterbahn Beach Resort, on the 3rd floor with patio views of Schlitterbahn Water Park. King Bed and Sofa Bed sleeps 4. Family friendly location with Schlitterbahn discounts tickets available in the Clubhouse. Except for children with parents, all guests must be at least 21. SPI Occupancy tax rate is 17%. Airbnb is collecting 6%. 11% ADDED to nightly rate.  2016-OPOCO4
column8: Pool-Hot Tubs-BBQ Grills-EZ Beach Access-Free WiFi
